location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Foreign Department, Government of India, to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Brief letter enclosing an original letter from the Secretary to the Punjab Government and asking that Pelly get Thomas Cadell to submit his views and remarks on the subject discussed in the enclosed letter.A note written by Pelly on the verso of folio 38, dated 25 October 1873 records that the letter has been replied to and that an original letter from Cadell has been enclosed along with the original letter from the Secretary to the Punjab Government.
